ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work was funded by Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council (BBSRC) Grant BB/J015563/1. S.E.-v.d.A. is supported by BBSRC Grant BB/M014207/1. Libraries were prepared and sequencing was carried out by the Next Generation Sequencing Facility at Leeds Institute of Biomedical and Clinical Sciences. Some strains of C. elegans were provided by the CGC, which is funded by NIH Office of Research Infrastructure Programs (P40 OD010440). The authors also wish to thank Dr. Catherine Lilley for useful discussions related to the work.
